title: "Stop the world, Tiabars want out." Is it the most accurate page on Facebook?
subtitle: The rumors: snoppes.com called the group 'Stop the World, Wants Tiabars Off' on 'The Most Precise Facebook Page'.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Facebook group 'Stop the World, 'Want Tiabars off' was considered the most accurate Facebook page.
